main event: A bright light was observed between Tulsa and Claremore, Oklahoma on a flight from Muroc, California to Wright-Patterson Air Force Base on March 7, 1952.
interesting points: The light was first sighted at 120 mph and appeared to be at the same altitude, traveling parallel to the flight.
As the object passed through the 12 o'clock position, it went out for one second and came on again.
There were no navigation lights observed on the object.
When the object passed abeam the aircraft, it finally went completely out.
The weather was clear and there was no interference from the aircraft.
witnesses: an officer of many years' experience
